newsitem.title: USA: Timeline doesn't expect "break-even" until H2 1997.
newsitem.headline: Timeline doesn't expect "break-even" until H2 1997.

text.p: BELLEVUE, Wash., Oct 2 (Reeuter) - Timeline Inc said Wednesday it does "not expect to reach break even company-wide until the second half of fiscal 1997."

The company, which markets Windows-based financial management and reporting systems, said its European division reached profitability in the second quarter of this fiscal year and recently closed a contract to supply financial software for Standard Chartered Plc in London.
The company reported a $0.23 per share loss in the first quarter ended June 30.
